dynamic-element.name: Title
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: All New Series of TX Robotic Machine

dynamic-element.name: Header
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: This new series combines intelligent vision, real-time autonomous motion control and Universal Robots' world-leading cobots to deliver the core of a machine loading system. Whether used for simple bin picking tasks or more complex machine tending applications, TX Series delivers a solution that's precise, consistent, intuitive and more agile than ever before.

dynamic-element.name: Body
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
With TX Robotics, there's no need to program every step of the process or rely on pre-programmed waypoints. Simply teach the system what you'd like it to do, and it will work out the best way to do it.

Our Autonomous Motion Module (AMM) is at the core, to deliver higher machine uptime with real-time robot control. It takes care of motion automatically, enabling the cobot to operate intuitively, and at its optimum.

TX Robotics also automatically exploits part and end effector symmetry to expand the range of path options for moving the part, instinctively adapting to perform at its best.
